## Description {#details}

This contains information emitted to BLOCKINFO&#95;BLOCK blocks.

These describe abbreviations that all blocks of the specified <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/callingconv/#abdf8cf606905c10634e831390981b0ed">ID</a> inherit.

Definition at line 41 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/bitstream/bitstreamreader-h">BitstreamReader.h</a>.
